roleset.name: wooly, not having hard edges

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is fuzzy

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: If she is still fuzzy - headed , we should probably go ahead and proceed to permanent pacing , which was discussed at length today , including a potential for bleeding , infection , cardiac and lung injury with pacemaker implantation .
